name: SaaS Venture Partners, LLC
overview:
SaaS Venture Partners is reshaping how SaaS Marketing Platforms build their monthly recurring revenue and annual bookings.

SaaS Platforms redefined the delivery of software to the market by delivering it as a hosted or managed service. This achieved a lower cost of ownership for companies, and enabled them to benefit of larger teams, resources and feedback to drive the best solution possible on a monthly license basis.

New entrants in the marketing vertical are typically changing the paradigm in some way. The evolution of SaaS Marketing Platforms starts from a core team of seasoned sales professionals who can sell though an evangelical pitch, and help marketers understand how they can unleash this new approach on their business.

As a SaaS business, the team you need in place for the first six or twelve months is very different from your VC’s vision. There is a tremendous amount of groundwork and effort that needs to be done before the days of web forms and inbound calls is all that is needed to close premium accounts for enterprise licenses.

You need to get an established, yet diversified client base of recurring revenue. These are a mixture of what the VCs call “Cornerstone” or “Lighthouse” clients, as well as medium clients.

When this is achieved, then you are prepared to move forward scaling your business. This needs to happen sooner than later. To win the market you need to mobilize an entire team consisting of experienced marketing technology professionals who have a “zero learning curve”, have connections, and can easily work through red tape to get the right deals signed.

CEOs and Founders of Marketing Technology Platforms believe in the SaaS model. No need for your customers to buy their own hardware and hire their own DBAs and network engineers, and build out expensive server farms. Instead, license your solution to their challenge.

Here at SaaS Venture Partners, we deliver Sales as a Service. No need to try and staff that large team today, simply pick up the phone and call us. We will flip the switch, understand your business, tailor a sales approach and begin driving revenue before you can get one job description agreed on.

Let’s get to work,

The SaaSVP Team
